**Relevant Ghanaian policies**

[Invasive Alien Species Policy, 2014](https://members.wto.org/crnattachments/2016/SPS/GHA/16_0951_00_e.pdf) - The policy aims at providing a holistic direction and guidance for actions in the regulation and management of invasive alien species to ensure biodiversity conservation.
